suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Fuencasa, San Fernando de Henares', 'title': 'Flat in Salamanca'}
description: For sale with guaranteed rent of this fantastic flat in Calle Salamanca, San Fernando de Henares (Madrid). The current owner, a 71 year old lady, will remain as a tenant for life paying a monthly rent of 590€ which will be revalued annually according to the CPI. The property has a market value of 215.000€. What does this imply? FORMALISATION COSTS: Paid in full by the buyer. The expenses generated in the sale (Transfer Tax, notary and registry). The Municipal Capital Gains Tax will be paid by the seller. MAINTENANCE COSTS: Once the transaction has been formalised before the notary, the expenses of the property will be distributed as follows: 1. The Real Estate Tax (IBI), the extraordinary charges and the building insurance will be assumed by the BUYER PARTY.  2. The ordinary community fees, the contents insurance, the urban waste tax and the utilities (electricity, water, etc. ), whether individualised or not, will be assumed BY THE SELLING PARTY. Description of the property Welcome to this magnificent home full of light and comfort! The spacious and bright living-dining room will welcome you with open arms, offering you a cosy and versatile space to enjoy unforgettable moments with family and friends. The exquisite decoration and carefully chosen details make this space a perfect meeting place. The kitchen, fully equipped with the latest appliances, will allow you to display your culinary talents and prepare delicious dishes with ease.  The terrace overlooks an open garden, allowing you to enjoy peaceful views and the beauty of the surroundings. The two main bedrooms (previously three), spacious and bright, invite you to relax and unwind in an atmosphere of peace and tranquillity. With fitted wardrobes, you will have all the space you need to organise your belongings in an orderly fashion. The modern and well-designed bathroom will give you a sense of relaxation and well-being with every use. Every detail has been thought of to create a private spa space in the comfort of your own home. We can't forget to mention the additional comforts of this incredible home, such as air conditioning and heating, which guarantee you a perfect temperature at any time of the year. There is also a storage room, ideal for storing your personal belongings and keeping your home tidy and organised. PROFESSIONAL FEES ARE 5.000€ + VAT AND ARE NOT INCLUDED IN THE SALE PRICE.
